thread.title: Valeant Bears Get Some Satisfaction

author: Maureen Farrell
title: Valeant Bears Get Some Satisfaction
text:
Bears on Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc. are getting their day —finally.
The drug company’s stock has been one of the best-performing this decade, and one of the most controversial.
At their peak closing price of $262.52 in early August,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
